p: Î²-caryophyllene (10 mg/kg, i.p.) was also explored in the presence of the antagonists NLX (1 mg/kg, i.p.), FMZ (10 mg/kg, i.p.), WAY (0.16 mg/kg, s.c.), or the nitric oxide synthase inhibitor NG-nitro- l-arginine methyl ester ( l-NAME, 20 mg/kg, i.p.). Doses were chosen from previous studies in the laboratory (see timeline in Figure 7C).
